thread.title: Video Insight to Introduce Its New HealthMonitor Cloud at ASIS 2015 Conference
thread.title_full: Video Insight to Introduce Its New HealthMonitor Cloud at ASIS 2015 Conference

title: Video Insight to Introduce Its New HealthMonitor Cloud at ASIS 2015 Conference
text: Video Insight to Introduce Its New HealthMonitor Cloud at ASIS 2015 Conference September 27, 2015 -- Houston, Texas (PRWEB) September 27, 2015 Video Insight , a leading developer of enterprise IP video surveillance software, will showcase new features for VI Monitor v6, HealthMonitor Cloud and its access control application, MonitorCast v3, during the ASIS International Conference in Anaheim, CA, September 28-29, at booth # 4015. ASIS International is the security industrys most influential conference. It allows for end users and integrators to receive hands-on access to the worlds latest security products from exhibitors like Video Insight. Video Insight will demonstrate the newly updated VI Monitor v6 with the new HealthMonitor Cloud. The new HealthMonitor Cloud offers the ability to keep track of all cameras enrolled on a server to monitor camera failures and cameras not recording. In addition, Video Insight will provide a MonitorCast v3 demonstration, an enterprise access control application designed to reduce the cost of entry into access control. This year we are excited to present these new, cost effective enhancements to the VI security product line at ASIS 2015, said Video Insight Chief Executive Officer Robert Shaw. ASIS 2015 provides a great opportunity to reach out to existing partners, solution providers, decision makers and leaders in the security community. With such a diverse assortment of attendees, ASIS 2015 allows the Video Insight team to interact and learn about our partners and customer needs, future requests, and get great feedback in the process. Attendees interested in learning more about the Video Insights new products and free certifications, will have an opportunity to do so by visiting booth #4015. Training and new product certification will be provided September 28 and 29 during the following times and covering the following topics: 10:30 AM
